00010 MathMLView2::MathMLView2(QWidget *parent)
00011         : QWidget(parent) {
00012     // the size of the widget is fixed
00013     setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Fixed, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
00014     // we have a buffered widget
00015     setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoBackground, true);
00016         m_doc = NULL;
00017         m_scale = 1;
00018         setFocusPolicy(Qt::StrongFocus);
00019     m_mmlimg.setOutline(false);
00020     QColor c = palette().background().color();
00021     m_mmlimg.setBackgroundColor(c.red()/256.0, c.green()/256.0, c.blue()/256.0);
00022 //    void setForeGroundColor(float, float, float);
00023     // initialize the font
00024     changeFont(font());
00025 }
00026 MathMLView2::~MathMLView2() {
00027         if (m_doc) {
00028                 delete m_doc;
00029         }
00030 }
00031 void
00032 MathMLView2::setDocument(const MMLDocument *d) {
00033         if (m_doc == d) return;
00034 
00035     // remove the image, because it references the buffer
00036     m_img = QImage();
00037     if (m_doc) {
00038         delete m_doc;
00039         }
00040         m_doc = d;
00041     m_mmlimg.setDocument(m_doc);
00042     updatePix();
00043 }
00044 void
00045 MathMLView2::updatePix() {
00046     if (m_doc) {
00047         uchar *data = m_mmlimg.getPixmap();
00048         int lw, lh;
00049         if (data) {
00050             lw = m_mmlimg.getWidth();
00051             lh = m_mmlimg.getHeight();
00052             m_img = QImage(data, lw, lh, QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00053         } else {
00054             m_img = QImage();
00055             lw = lh = 0;
00056         }
00057         if (lw*m_scale != width() || lh*m_scale != m_scale*height()) {
00058             updateGeometry();
00059         }
00060         update();
00061     }
00062 }
00063 void
00064 MathMLView2::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event) {
00065     QPainter p(this);
00066     p.scale(m_scale, m_scale);
00067     p.drawImage(0, 0, m_img);
00068 }
00069 void
00070 MathMLView2::changeFont(const QFont &f) {
00071     float size = font().pointSizeF();
00072     if (size == -1) {
00073         // there are 72 points per inch
00074         size = font().pixelSize()*72.0/logicalDpiX();
00075     }
00076     m_mmlimg.setFont((const char*)font().family().toUtf8(), size);
00077         setFont(f);
00078     updatePix();
00079 }
00080 void
00081 MathMLView2::changeZoom(float s) {
00082     if (m_scale != s) {
00083             m_scale = s;
00084         updateGeometry();
00085     }
00086 }
00087 void
00088 MathMLView2::setOutline(bool o) {
00089         m_mmlimg.setOutline(o);
00090     updatePix();
00091 }
00092 void
00093 MathMLView2::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *e) {
00094         setFocus();
00095         if (m_doc) {
00096         float x = e->x()/m_scale;
00097         float y = e->y()/m_scale;
00098         m_mmlimg.getCoords(x, y);
00099         bool change;
00100                 if (e->modifiers() == Qt::ShiftModifier) {
00101                         change = m_doc->constcursor()->selectTo(x, y);
00102                 } else {
00103                         change = m_doc->constcursor()->moveTo(x, y);
00104                 }
00105                 if (change) {
00106                         emit cursorChanged();
00107             m_mmlimg.repaint();
00108             updatePix();
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 }
00112 void
00113 MathMLView2::mouseMoveEvent ( QMouseEvent *e  ) {
00114         setFocus();
00115         if (m_doc) {
00116                 float x = e->x()/m_scale;
00117                 float y = e->y()/m_scale;
00118         m_mmlimg.getCoords(x, y);
00119                 bool change = m_doc->constcursor()->selectTo(x, y);
00120                 if (change) {
00121             m_mmlimg.repaint();
00122             updatePix();
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 }
00126 void
00127 MathMLView2::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *e) {
00128         if (m_doc) {
00129                 ConstMathCursor *c = m_doc->constcursor();
00130                 bool change = true;
00131                 if (e->modifiers() == Qt::ShiftModifier) {
00132                         switch (e->key()) {
00133                         case Qt::Key_Up:
00134                                 //n = c->moveUp();
00135                                 break;
00136                         case Qt::Key_Down:
00137                                 //n = c->moveDown();
00138                                 break;
00139                         case Qt::Key_Left:
00140                                 c->selectPrevious();
00141                                 break;
00142                         case Qt::Key_Right:
00143                                 c->selectNext();
00144                                 break;
00145                         default:
00146                                 change = false;
00147                                 break;
00148                         }
00149                 } else {
00150                         switch (e->key()) {
00151                         case Qt::Key_Up:
00152                                 c->moveUp();
00153                                 break;
00154                         case Qt::Key_Down:
00155                                 c->moveDown();
00156                                 break;
00157                         case Qt::Key_Left:
00158                                 c->movePrevious();
00159                                 break;
00160                         case Qt::Key_Right:
00161                                 c->moveNext();
00162                                 break;
00163                         default:
00164                                 change = false;
00165                                 break;
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168                 if (change) {
00169                         emit cursorChanged();
00170             m_mmlimg.repaint();
00171             updatePix();
00172                 }
00173                 printf("%s\n", c->container()->nodeName());
00174         }
00175 }

00180         m_doc->constcursor()->setBeforeNode(0);
